name: Re:風 (Re:Wind)
description:
This game is project close to my heart dedicated to my deceased grandfather.
A platfomer with a short wordless story to be a little relaxing and that is trying to express the struggle of losing someone.
It is a emotional rollercoaster after hearing that someone precious isn't on this planet anymore. The first moments it feels unreal and then makes one sad, quite sad. It doesn't let one sleep and the memories keep repeating in ones head. I am not good with words but let me give you one thing on your way. Nothing is forever.
Feel free to share your experiences of grief and loss but only if you feel comfortable.
Feedback would be nice, too. ;->

Controls
AD - Move
W - Wind
Space - Jump

Credits
Programming, Design, Music, some Sounds and some Art: Vinzenz Prakoso
Pixel Art: https://aamatniekss.itch.io/deep-forest-pixel-tileset
Backgrounds: https://edermunizz.itch.io/pixel-art-plataformer-painted-style
SFX: https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack
Font: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold
